title: How I Salvaged Old Farm Gates For A New Animal Shelter

subtasks: Inspecting the damage to the fence
Calculating the necessary materials for the gates
Cutting the materials to the required size
Planning the weld points for the gates
Positioning the gates in the fence opening
Ensuring the gates are properly aligned and leveled
Fastening the gates to the fence posts
Purchasing a basic welder for personal use
Watching YouTube tutorials on welding techniques

tasks.task: Obtaining a welder for DIY projects
Implementing safety measures during DIY welding
Using safety equipment during construction. Subtasks could include:
Repair and install a farm gate
Repair and reinforce a split farm gate
Repair and Reinforce a Split Farm Gate**
